attributes.action: Let the people of uk decide over vote what/ how to handle Covid rather than 1man
attributes.additional_details: To create an app where people can go on to and to vote what they think is best too do for the country/ their home towns or city’s... and the Majority Vote will be put into place.... borris has now ruined businesses and jobs and people’s lives in the second wave but doing the wrong thing and it is now up to the people of the uk to decide what is next as it is our lives not the governments. This app will have options that the government has suggested but ideally will be up to the uk to decide
attributes.background: From now to let the uk citizens decide over vote what they think is best for the country not just one man who has made multiple terrible decisions through This pandemic
